projects.title: Flowy, associates management tool
projects.description: Flowy is an internal tool for managing employees. It allows real-time shift planning in every onboarded department. It covers a 24-hour shift timeframe, providing seamless pipeline release according to internal standards.

projects.title: Aquati.co.uk
projects.description: Aquati Ltd is a UK-based water solutions provider dedicated to delivering advanced aquatic technology and sustainable water management systems. Rooted in a commitment to research-driven innovation, Aquati offers an extensive range of products and services designed to optimise performance, reduce environmental impact, and meet the unique needs of various industries. Their approach combines high-quality engineering, user-friendly interfaces, and cutting-edge design to ensure reliable, efficient, and scalable solutions. Through continuous investment in emerging technologies and an unwavering focus on customer satisfaction, Aquati remains at the forefront of environmentally conscious water management practices.

projects.title: Gareth Williams Cofounder & ex-CEO of Skyscanner Data Analyst Intern
projects.description: During my Saltire Scholar internship under Gareth Williams, Co-Founder of Skyscanner, I focused on data analysis and innovation. By examining government procurement procedures, I identified inefficiencies and opportunities for improvement and leveraged AI-driven solutions to streamline data collection, categorization, and synthesis. My findings were translated into clear, actionable reports, enhancing stakeholder decision-making. This experience also provided valuable insights into entrepreneurial best practices and cross-functional team collaboration, shaping my approach to strategic problem-solving.
